name: Set of 3 Heart Face Scrubbies - White, Lavender, and White-Pink-Lavender Multi
description:
Why spend money on throw-away facial cloths? Hand-crocheted in cotton yarn, this set of three face scrubbies is perfect for exfoliation of the skin. I used 100% cotton yarn for this Valentine-inspired set. You will receive one in white, one in lavender, and one in white, pink, and lavender variegated yarn! They include a hanging loop for your convenience. Can be used with your favorite soaps, cleansers, or exfoliants and are machine-washable. Re-use them over and over again.

	Measures approximately 4” across widest part and 4 3/4” from top to bottom.

	If you prefer different colors (to match your bathroom, perhaps?), please contact me and I will be happy to stitch a face scrubby especially for you. I ♥ special orders!

name: Set of 3 Heart Face Scrubbies - Pink and White
description:
Why spend money on throw-away facial cloths? Hand-crocheted in cotton yarn, this set of three face scrubbies is perfect for exfoliation of the skin. I used 100% cotton yarn for this 3 piece set. You will receive 3 scrubbies made with a pink and white twisted yarn! They include a hanging loop for your convenience. Can be used with your favorite soaps, cleansers, or exfoliants and are machine-washable. Re-use them over and over again.

	Measures approximately 4” across widest part and 4 3/4” from top to bottom.

	If you prefer different colors (to match your bathroom, perhaps?), please contact me and I will be happy to stitch a face scrubby especially for you. I ♥ special orders!

name: Set of 2 Rectangular Face Scrubbies - Khaki and White
description:
Scrubbies for the men in your life! Hand-crocheted in 100% cotton yarn (a khaki and white twisted yarn), this set of two rectangular face scrubbies is fashioned with a slight texture on the front (shown in photo 3). This texture is perfect for exfoliation of the skin. The back of the stitching, which is flatter than the front, is shown in photo 4. They are finished nicely all around and include a hanging loop for your convenience. Can be used with your favorite soaps, cleansers, or exfoliants and are machine-washable.

	Measures approximately 4 1/4” high and 5 1/4” across.

	If you prefer a different color, please contact me and I will be happy to stitch a face scrubby especially for you. I ♥ custom orders!

name: Lipstick/Lip Balm Holder w/ Keyring - Pink, Purple, White
description:
Just adorable! Crafted from pink, purple, and white cotton yarn, this little holder is just the right size for your favorite lipstick or lip balm. It has a button closure and a keyring. Sorry, lipstick/balm not included.

	Measures approximately 3” from top to bottom (when closed) and 1” across.

	If you prefer different colors, please contact me and I will be happy to stitch a holder especially for you. I ♥ special orders!

name: Lipstick/Lip Balm Holder w/ Keyring - Purple, Aqua, Turquoise
description:
Crafted from purple, aqua, and turquoise cotton yarn, this little holder is just the right size for your favorite lipstick or lip balm. It has a button closure (color of button may be different than in photo) and a key ring. Sorry, lipstick/balm not included.

	Measures approximately 3” from top to bottom (when closed) and 1” across.

	If you prefer different colors, please contact me and I will be happy to stitch a holder especially for you. I ♥ special orders!
